text: Hemitheconyx is a genus of geckos. Both species are found in Africa. They are known as fat-tailed geckos and often resemble leopard geckos. ==Species== There are two recognized species in the genus Hemitheconyx: *Hemitheconyx caudicinctus (Duméril, 1851) – (African) fat-tailed gecko *Hemitheconyx taylori Parker, 1930 – Taylor's fat-tail(ed) gecko ==References== Category:Lizard genera Category:Geckos of Africa Category:Taxa named by Leonhard Stejneger
title: Hemitheconyx
